definition: can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy
want to stop but can't (idiom)/to be unable to stop oneself/to feel an urge to continue
unable to control oneself/to be beside oneself
not corrupted by wealth and honors
not shaken by poverty/to preserve one's ambitions although destitute
without rules, nothing can be done (idiom, from Mencius); one must follow some rules
pinyin: bu4 yi3 gui1 ju5 , bu4 neng2 cheng2 fang1 yuan2

definition: avid/eager for/longing for/to look forward to

pinyin: jin1 qian2 bu4 neng2 mai3 lai2 xing4 fu2

definition: money isn't everything, but without money you can do nothing (idiom)
pinyin: qian2 bu4 shi4 wan4 neng2 de5 , mei2 qian2 shi4 wan4 wan4 bu4 neng2 de5
containing_words.word: 钱不是万能的，没钱是万万不能的

definition: akathisia (condition of restlessness, a side-effect of neuroleptic antipsychotic drug)/unable to sit still/hyperactivity/restlessness

sentences.english: There aring a lot of secrets in the man heart can't say literally that let wife listen to.
sentences.chinese: 男人心中有好多秘密不能随便说给妻子听。

sentences.english: Nathan noted that the study can't prove that smoking causes diabetes.
sentences.chinese: 内森说此项研究不能证明吸烟会导致糖尿病。

sentences.english: When you’re a kid, you cannot go anywhere by yourself.
sentences.chinese: 当你是一个孩子的时候，你不能自己去任何地方。

sentences.english: That won't stop us from blathering on about it, of course.
sentences.chinese: 当然，这并不能阻止我们在这个问题上喋喋不休。

sentences.english: With no wind indoors, for example, sweat will not evaporate as effectively.
sentences.chinese: 比如说室内无风，就不能有效蒸发汗水。

sentences.english: We cannot rule out the possibility of mistaken identity.
sentences.chinese: 我们不能排除有认错人的可能。

sentences.english: The rotary bable can't rotate . There is too much torque.
sentences.chinese: 转盘不能转了，扭矩太大了。

sentences.english: We should have our only methods when doing things, and shouldn't imitate others mechanically.
sentences.chinese: 我们做事得有自己的方法，不能邯郸学步。

sentences.english: Andrew's face fell when he was told he couldn' t go on the trip.
sentences.chinese: 安德鲁听说他不能去旅游时脸沉了下来。

sentences.english: But he must not espouse the old lady needlessly.
sentences.chinese: 不过，他不能毫无必要地娶那个老女人。

sentences.english: Even the GOD cannot guarantee everyone would be better.
sentences.chinese: 上帝也不能保祐每一个人。

sentences.english: Can you just keep your nose out of my life?
sentences.chinese: 你能不能不要管我的生活。

sentences.english: Unfortunately, we cannot send other Test Report forms to you directly.
sentences.chinese: 但是，我们不能将额外的成绩单直接寄给您本人。

sentences.english: You cannot use an external table in a sub-query
sentences.chinese: 不能在子查询中使用一个外部表。

sentences.english: That deficit is not my deficit.
sentences.chinese: 这个赤字不能算成我的赤字。

definition: important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if
haven't/hasn't/doesn't exist/to not have/to not be
at a loss/unable to do anything about it/to have no choice
improbable/unlikely/will not (act, happen etc)/not able/not having learned to do sth/(coll.) (Tw) don't mention it/not at all
can only/obliged to do sth/to have no other choice
can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy
